programme.title: Election predictions and certainties
programme.short_synopsis: Is it possible to predict the outcome of a presidential election?
programme.medium_synopsis: The 1992 Presidential election, the dangers of predicting the outcome of the vote and a look to history for examples of election certainty.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
